bibl.title: Letter from R.F. Cowley to Philip Showalter Hench, May 6, 1940

div1.p: Cowley indicates that Hench's letter of April 30, [1940] to Recio has been forwarded to him.

div1.head: Letter from R.F. Cowley to Philip Showalter Hench, May 6, 1940
div1.opener:
LABORATORIO CLINICO
DEL
DR. ALBERTO RECIO
AVE. DE LA INDEPENDENCIA Y MONTORO
TELEFONO U-2859
H A B A N A
____
3/6/41 - Nute Post
May 6, 1940.
Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minn.
Dear Dr Hench:
div1.p:
Dr. Recio is at present in Washington
attending the States and Provincials Health Authori-
ties' meeting and may stay over for the Pan American
Scientific Congress which is scheduled to start this
week. I have forwarded to him your letter of April 30
so that you may get a prompt reply.
